title: [Melgorehn's Valley, Grasslands]
description: Beneath your feet, the ground crunches slightly.  The soil is slightly rockier here, the grass less thick.  To the northwest is the face of the mountain, its details cloaked in night and mystery, taunting you with the need to explore.

Beneath your feet, the ground crunches slightly.  The soil is slightly rockier here, the grass less thick.  To the northwest is the face of the mountain, large and mysterious, taunting you with the need to explore.
